item.title: Terraform Functions and Expressions Explained
item.description: Functions in HashiCorp Terraform are integral to making your configurations flexible, efficient, and maintainable. They are pre-defined operations that can be used within expressions to transform and combine values. These functions can manipulate strings, perform mathematical calculations, and handle complex data structures like maps and lists, among other tasks. These functions can also be combined [â€¦] The article Terraform Functions and Expressions Explained was originally published on Build5Nines. To stay up-to-date, Subscribe to the Build5Nines Newsletter.
